snippet.title: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Official Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Crime Boss: Rockay City will be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S on June 15, 2023. Watch the latest trailer and let Travis Baker (played by Michael Madsen) take you on a tour of Crime Boss: Rockay City, including a peek at console gameplay from this organized crime game that combines first-person shooter action and turf wars. 

In Crime Boss: Rockay City, Travis Baker (played by Michael Madsen) sets out on the classic American story of starting from nothing and clawing his way to the throne of a criminal world by any means necessary. After a mysterious death puts the city’s lords in a power struggle vortex, Baker will have to use his grit and wits to conduct effective heists. Cross paths with a colorful cast including Danny Trejo, Kim Basinger, Danny Glover, Michael Rooker, Damion Poiter, Vanilla Ice, and Chuck Norris as Baker’s arch-nemesis, Sheriff Norris.

#IGN #Gaming #CrimeBossRockayCity
